channel.title: DevoutX PK / ECO Multi World
channel.description:
[CENTER] [URL=http://"http://devoutx.com/"][IMG]http://devoutx.com/images/leakforums/logo.png[/img][/URL]
[SIZE=4] [URL=http://devoutx.com/index.php][b]Forums[/b][/URL]|[URL=http://devoutx.com/DevoutX.jar][b]Download[/b][/URL][color=orange]|[/COLOR][URL=http://devoutx.com/misc.php?page=playnow][b]Playnow[/b][/URL]
DevoutX is a highly developed and extremely [color=orange]stable[/COLOR] server. Complete with [color=orange]2 worlds[/COLOR] - Economy and PK. Economy allows for players who prefer to take a slower pace to the game and develop their skills on their own, we have also included many bosses and npcs to fight to keep things interesting. The PK world lets players choose their levels and items to compete against each other in a responsive and [color=orange]flawless Player V Player Environment[/COLOR].
Through both worlds there is amazing interfaces, minigames, wonderful players and shops to discover. One of the greatest feature that we can boast is our [color=orange]Grand Exchange[/COLOR]. It works without fail and promises to get those hard to sell items sold!
I won't mention everything, I'll just let your curiosity get the better of you. ;) I plan to take DevoutX along way, but I will need your support![/SIZE]
~ALL SKILLS WORK~ ~ALL MINIGAMES WORK~ ~ALL MONSTERS WORK~ ~ALL COMABT WORKS~
[size=14pt]IMAGES / MEDIA[/size] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/rFFqt3y.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/q1Rgyg.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/PHSSWY.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/gc1POWD.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/bDmooi.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/ZLw1BB5.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/nWtjtKv.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/hFjfgk.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/2n3l1gC.png[/img] [IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/ZGosYa.png[/img] *note: The action button text (etc) only appears because I have it enabled on my admin account.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=XKVnUCx4CcU
[SIZE=4][URL=http://"http://www.devoutx.com"][IMG]http://www.pictrace.com/b/PtXCQ/devoutxcopy.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://devoutx.com/index.php][b]Forums[/b][/URL]|[URL=http://devoutx.com/DevoutX.jar][b]Download[/b][/URL][color=orange]|[/COLOR][URL=http://devoutx.com/misc.php?page=playnow][b]Playnow[/b][/URL][/SIZE]
[/CENTER]
